actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend US Code with respect to the definitions of widow and widower for the purpose of survivor's annuities.

summary.text: Redefines the terms "widow" and "widower" for the purpose of survivors annuities paid to Federal employees. Allows the treatment as a widow or widower of one who was married to the Federal employee for a period of less than two years immediately prior to the employee's death if prior periods of marriage accumlate a period of two years. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8341(a) (1)(A))

titles.title: A bill to amend US Code with respect to the definitions of widow and widower for the purpose of survivor's annuities.
